body.name: Alaffia EveryDay Shea Conditioner, Moisturizes, Restores and Protects. Made with Fair Trade Shea Butter, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, Vegan, Unscented 32 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 28 mins
features: SHEA CONDITIONER. Alaffia EveryDay Shea Conditioners are clean and handcrafted with shea leaf extract and fair-trade unrefined "raw" shea butter.

MOISTURIZE, RESTORE, & PROTECT. Unrefined "raw" shea butter is deeply moisturizing and nutrient-rich, softens & revitalizes dull, dry hair. Antioxidant-rich shea leaf restores, protects and fortifies hair and scalp from root to tip. For everyday use, suitable for normal to very dry hair.
UNSCENTED. We've formulated this without any fragrances to give you that good-loving nourishment your hair deserves. Made with unrefined shea butter.

CLEAN, FAIR TRADE, SULFATE-FREE. Made with love and respect. Alaffia products contain "NO" sulfates, parabens, phthalates, silicones, mineral oil, artificial color or synthetic fragrance. Proudly Cruelty-free.

Alaffia is a social enterprise on a mission to create a more sustainable and equitable future. Our women-led cooperatives in West Africa produce fair-trade ingredients rooted in tradition. When you choose our handcrafted products, you join us in supporting education, maternal care, and environmental sustainability.
body.description: Alaffia EveryDay Shea Conditioner Unscented Alaffia's simply unscented conditioner is prepared with Ethically Traded unrefined shea butter, antioxidant-rich shea leaf and is unscented for sensitive scalp. It restores natural pH, leaving hair moisturized, luxurious and protected. For EveryDay use on normal to very dry hair. USES: Unrefined "raw" shea butter is deeply moisturizing and nutrient-rich, softens & revitalizes dull, dry hair. Antioxidant-rich shea leaf restores, protects and fortifies hair and scalp from root to tip. For everyday use, suitable for normal to very dry hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Faithful to Detangle!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have very long, thick hair that is prone to tangling, knots, and matting. I do not use any products with artificial fragrance in them, so I have tried many different "natural" brands that have simply not been moisturizing/detangling enough for my hair. This conditioner is the ONLY one I have found in stores that's ingredients meet my standards and detangle my hair! I use it as a shaving cream as well because of it's moisturizing effects. I have used this conditioner for over 2 years now. I will admit that the "Vanilla Mint" conditioner is the only one that has this effect on my hair. The other scents do not seem to be formulated the same, as they do not moisturize as well as this one does. The scent is so pleasant & light--& no artificial fragrance!! I highly, HIGHLY recommend Alaffia's "Vanilla Mint" conditioner for those who are looking for a conditioner that detangles and is one of the cleanest in stores!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong scent
reviews.reviewText: This product has a very strong scent. Bought this bc it was cheaper than the original and I don't mind lavender scent. I like to mix up products I like in my shower ritual. I have light straight black hair and my partner has thick long black hair. It makes it feel great. Might cut it with some original when I don't want that level of intensity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lavander essential oil is clinically proven to regrow hair as well as 2.5% Minoxadil, and this conditioner contains large amounts of lavander essential oil. I soak it in from scalp and root to end and let it sit for a minuet or so before rinsing. The result is beautiful, soft and shiny hair. I have course, porus, wavy hair so this product may be better suited to that hair type which would make some sense as this is sometimes sold in the ethnic hair department of pharmacies. Nonetheless, I think it's a great product.I also like that it is Fair Trade Certified and that buying it supports living wages for the workers thst made it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stinks a little
reviews.reviewText: Has a small smell. I dont like it but works great. Makes my hair nice and soft. Think ill stick to the lavender tho

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super Fast Delivery and Everything is Awesome Shape. This is my 2 Time Buying from this Seller Keep it up 👍🏻 Nice Job In Love ♥️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had to change all of my hair care products due to a new allergy. This conditioner was listed as a 100 on skin safe so I gave it a try. I have very fine hair and had to give up all my plumping hair products. It turned out to be the best thing ever because I didn't need them using this product. I highlight and color my hair every 4 weeks and this conditioner has protected my hair. It is a great value, I am also saving money not buying the expensive hair products I had been using-like living proof and it's a 10. Great product, please keep selling it here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I have suffered from breakouts on my back almost my entire life. I have sensitive skin and I'm sensitive to fragrance. Those wonderful smelling shampoos and conditioners run down my back when I wash my hair causing breakouts in their path. Finally this conditioner solved that! But it's not the 1st fragrance free conditioner that I've tried. That's why I was still searching until now. This Alaffia conditioner is perfect for my slightly curly, color treated, fine hair. It gives just the right amount of moisture and shine without weighing my hair down. I pair it with my shampoo bar. I love Alaffia's other products too. For the 1st time ever I can shave with my conditioner because it's fragrance free and doesn't sting, itch or burn like others. If you've never shaved with conditioner you've got to try it! You will get an extremely close shave and it's super inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not moisturize
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is not moisturizing at all. Hair still feels dry after using. It takes way too much conditioner to brush through knots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2015
